data_table.description: Subject ID, consent group, subject source, source subject ID, and affection status of participants with or without Barrett's and esophageal adenocarcinoma and involved in the "Barrett's and Esophageal Adenocarcinoma Genetic Susceptibility Study (BEAGESS)" project.

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.description: Consent group as determined by DAC
variable.value: Subjects did not participate in the study, did not complete a consent document and are included only for the pedigree structure and/or genotype controls, such as HapMap subjects

variable.name: SOURC_SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: Subject ID used in the Source Repository

variable.name: AFFECTION_STATUS
variable.description: Case control status of the subject
